      • getCommandTemplate

        public java.lang.String[] getCommandTemplate​(java.lang.String line)
        Get template to be used for commands. [0] = command, [1+] are arguments
        Parameters:
        line - line to be split into a command template
        Returns:
        returns array of each individual word from players input line
